column2: vis.nodes <- cleanedcms  #this creates a new dataframe from my Cleaned CMS data
vis.nodes$id <- vis.nodes$CMS #while I use the CMS number as IDs for most projects, visNetwork requires an explicit ID column.
vis.nodes$shadow <- TRUE  #I want my nodes to have shadows (so they look exciting)
vis.nodes$title <- vis.nodes$hosp_name #text on click--the hospital name
vis.nodes$size <- (cleanedcms$Beds)/25 #scale dot size to match the number of beds
colrs <- rainbow(87, alpha=1) #This creates a list of colors (as I am too lazy to pick my own)
vis.nodes$color.background <- (colrs)[as.factor(vis.nodes$network)] #assigns node color by hospital network
